channel.title: Barrage wont stop freezing? someone help please
channel.description:
Okay when u attack someone with ice barrage they wont un freeze after a set amount of time. if you keep freezing them they have almost no hope of winning a fight if they are meleeing. and when after they die. they are still frozen for about 20 minutes.
Someone please help me fix this.

item.title: Barrage wont stop freezing? someone help please

Okay when u attack someone with ice barrage they wont un freeze after a set amount of time. if you keep freezing them they have almost no hope of winning a fight if they are meleeing. and when after they die. they are still frozen for about 20 minutes.
